education.title: Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science - Study Abroad
education.content: Studied abroad for a semester at Yonsei University in Seoul, South Korea. Took courses in Korean Language, Compiler Design, and Philosophy in East Asian Literature while immersing myself in the culture and history of South Korea.

education.title: Global Career Accelerator
education.content: Developed my professional skills, global mindset, and front-end development skills through a series of workshops, networking events, and project competitions with companies like Wells Fargo and Lo'real.

careers.title: Mobile App Developer Intern
careers.content: Created an Internal Plugin for the Mobile App Development Team that utilizes Figma's tree node structure to generate custom Vue component code from Figma designs, allowing for a quick drag-and-drop workflow to create new screens in our app.

careers.title: Systems and Programming Intern
careers.content: Migrated and updated legacy internal web applications to modern frameworks and libraries, improving performance and user experience by utilizing new features like VueRouter, Vite, and Vuex.

careers.title: Machine Learning Research Assistant
careers.content: Contributed to the development of an Object Detection pipeline model by optimizing mask R-CNN architectures and line thinning techniques to improve accuracy of landscape analysis through thinner but continuous lines. Utilized Meta's 'Segment Anything' model to get better segmentation masks for the pipeline.

careers.title: Summer Technological Intern
careers.content: Accepted into and attended a startup accelerator for my co-founded business based on reducing traffic congestion and carbon emmisions through

. Through mentorship and workshops, I gained hands-on experience in pitching, market research, and product development. I developed a business plan and prototype for a startup focused on optimizing traffic flow through computer vision and machine learning techniques. I created a back-end density calculating algorithm that utilized the real-time data attained from computer vision to demonstrate the technology and its potential environmental impact on urban planning for local and state-level municipalities.

careers.title: Co-founder and Developer
careers.content: Co-founded a startup focused on optimizing traffic flow by using computer vision within Yolov8-integrated cameras to stream real-time data into our back-end density calculating algorithms. Met with local governments and the NCDOT to learn what features and data would be most useful and which areas throughout the state needed to be addressed first. Check us out at magnoliametrics.com
